UV light may have sparked life on Earth "Simple RNA molecules can evolve under certain conditions - this is a well-developed field. But the question left is: how do you get the first long enough RNA polymer?" says Mulkidjanian. "Our model offers some physically plausible explanation of how long RNA polymers could emerge."
